section.name: General
section.p: This project aims to produce high quality software. Therefore it is very important that the code is well designed, documented and tested. No sub-project should be released (as official version) if it has NOT been tested intensively (though it can obviously still have bugs).

section.name: Maven
section.p:
The project is using maven as build- and management-tool. Therefore the maven conventions apply to this project. If you are NOT familiar with maven please read the following guides:
